room_title: Escape room "Weird Science" by Escape at the Shore in Atlantic City
review: The boys (teenagers) loved the Weird Science room! Thank you!

room_title: Escape room "Weird Science" by Escape at the Shore in Atlantic City
review: This was the first escape room for me and five friends, and it was amazing! We did Weird Science and even though we didn't escape, the owner (and puzzle marker) assisted us with figuring out the puzzle. It was worth the money.
